Author: lover_007
Text: You should get a heating blanket!!! I got one a week ago and omgggg I’m sleeping like a baby now

Author: bigglob
Text: grab a hot water bottle (use water that’s just about to boil, like when you can see the really tiny bubbles forming at the bottom of the kettle) + remember to let out the steam by kinda bending it a bit so it’s more comfortable to hold onto and you’re less likely to damage it that way, hang in there!
